mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecd.CAMP_USER_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleNumMon, ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecd.CAMP_SUCC_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleSuccessNumMon from mtl_eval_info_plan_d mecd where DATE_FORMAT(mecd.STAT_DATE, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
and mecd.CITY_ID =#{userCity}

select ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecm.CAMP_USER_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleNumPast, ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecm.CAMP_SUCC_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleSuccessNumPast from mtl_eval_info_plan_m mecm
where mecm.CITY_ID =#{userCity}

select ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecd.CAMP_USER_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleNumDay, ifnull(sum(ifnull(mecd.CAMP_SUCC_NUM, 0)), 0) as saleSuccessNumDay from mtl_eval_info_plan_d mecd where to_days(mecd.STAT_DATE) = to_days(DATE_ADD(sysdate(), interval -1 day ))
and mecd.CITY_ID =#{userCity}
